meta.name: description
meta.content: diptyque is a pioneering parfumerie Maison, a precursor of the art of living through the senses, where fragrance and art are integral to everything.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: diptyque e-shop : fragrances, candles, fragrances for home, body care.

link.title: Diptyque Paris | Official Website

link.script:
<% if(data.query.categoryCompressed) { %> <% if(data.query.categoryCompressed.result.length > 0 ){ %>
Category
<% helper.each(data.query.categoryCompressed.result,function(key,category){ %>
<a target="_self" href="<%=category.url%>" class="klevu-track-click" data-url="<%=category.url%>" data-name="<%=category.name%>" ><%=category.name%> <% }); %>
<% } else { %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickNoResultCategory',scope) %> <% } %> <% } else { %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickNoResultCategory',scope) %> <% } %>

div.div: Sorry, we could not find any results matching your search.

link.script:
<% if(data.query.cmsCompressed) { %> <% if(data.query.cmsCompressed.result.length > 0 ){ %>
Pages
<% helper.each(data.query.cmsCompressed.result,function(key,cms){ %>
<a target="_self" href="<%=cms.url%>" class="klevu-track-click" data-url="<%=cms.url%>" data-name="<%=cms.name%>"><%=cms.name%> <% }); %>
<% } else { %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickNoResultCms',scope) %> <% } %> <% } else { %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickNoResultCms',scope) %> <% } %>

• <%=dataLocal.stickyLabelHead%> <%=dataLocal.name%> <%=dataLocal.summaryAttribute%><%=dataLocal.stickyLabelText%> <% if(dataLocal.ondiscount && dataLocal.ondiscount == "true") { %> <% if(dataLocal.salePrice ) { %> <%=helper.processCurrency(dataLocal.currency,parseInt(dataLocal.salePrice) || dataLocal.salePrice)%> <% } %> <% if(dataLocal.price) { %> <%=helper.translate("Original price %s",helper.processCurrency(dataLocal.currency,parseInt(dataLocal.price) || dataLocal.price))%> <% } %> <% } else { %> <% if(dataLocal.salePrice ) { %> <%=helper.processCurrency(dataLocal.currency,parseInt(dataLocal.salePrice) || dataLocal.salePrice)%> <% } %> <% } %>

<% if(data.query.productList) { %> <% if(data.query.productList.result.length > 0 ) { %>
<% if(data.query.productList.meta.searchedTerm == '*' ) { %>
Trending now <% } else { %>
Products <% } %>
<% if(data.query.productList.meta.searchedTerm != '*' ) { %>
<a href="https://www.diptyqueparis.com/en_eu<%=helper.buildUrl(data.settings.landingUrl,'q',helper.stripHtml(data.settings.term))%>" target="_parent">View all products
<% } %>
<% helper.each(data.query.productList.result,function(key,product){ %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickProductBlock',scope,data,product) %> <% }); %>
<% } else { %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickNoResultFound',scope) %> <% } %> <% } else { %> <%=helper.render('klevuQuickNoResultFound',scope) %> <% } %>

meta.content: at diptyque, fragrances are created around powerful stories and joyful recollections. Today, it is Do Son taking shape.

meta.name: nosto-msi-version

body.div: The store will not work correctly in the case when cookies are disabled.

p.strong: JavaScript seems to be disabled in your browser.
p.span: For the best experience on our site, be sure to turn on Javascript in your browser.

a.title: Ilio, the horizon in a bottle

img.alt: Ilio, the horizon in a bottle

a.title: Ilio, the horizon in a bottle

strong.a: Ilio, the horizon in a bottle

a.title: Discover the multi-surface cleaner with vinegar

img.alt: Discover the multi-surface cleaner with vinegar

a.title: Discover the multi-surface cleaner with vinegar

strong.a: Discover the multi-surface cleaner with vinegar

a.title: Ilio, as an eau de toilette...

img.alt: Ilio, as an eau de toilette...

li.p: Ilio, as an eau de toilette...
li.h3: is an homage to the Mediterranean
...an ode to the entire fig tree: the green freshness of the leaves, the milky flavour of the figs, the density of the white wood.
Enjoy its aromatic floral fragrance and facets of verbena and orange blossom at any time.
Two scents, Lilac and Rosemary, like the favorite flowers of Charles and Marie-Laure de Noailles.
Its formulation incorporates essential oils that have been selected for their mosquito-repelling properties with the flowery accents of neroli and orange blossom.
Day and night, diptyque's Do Son, Eau Rose, Fleur de Peau, and Eau Capitale scented creams protect and repair skin while leaving it smelling great.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

div.a: Receive a sponge when you order a product from the La Droguerie collection with the code : DROGUERIE

div.h2: The information below is required for social login

fieldset.div: Please complete your information below to creat an account.

div.p: New customer? Create an account to enjoy exclusive benefits and services.
To enjoy access to exclusive benefits

div.script: require(["jquery", "mage/calendar"], function ($) { $("#mp_sociallogin_dob").calendar({ showsTime: false, dateFormat: "dd/MM/yyyy", buttonImage: "https://d3oi16fyxsm8ns.cloudfront.net/static/version0.0.0.458/frontend/Magento/base/default/Magento_Theme/calendar.png", yearRange: "-120y:c+nn", buttonText: "Select Date", maxDate: "-1d", changeMonth: true, changeYear: true, showOn: "both", autoComplete: false }) });

input.name: optin_newsletter
input.title: Sign Up for the diptyque Newsletter

label.span: Sign up for email updates on product launches, exclusive events and more

div.p: By submitting the form, I agree to the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy.

fieldset.div: Please enter your email address below to receive a password reset link.

div.class: widget block widget-image-text-custom-border-block images-src-mode bottom_left image_full_width banner-home-minthe

div.div: On warm skin Ilio, Do Son and Eau des Sens tell their stories of sun, escape and fresh orange trees. As an eau de toilette or hair mist, these three diptyque perfumes are the embodiment of summer. In the air and on your skin.

On warm skin Ilio, Do Son and Eau des Sens tell their stories of sun, escape and fresh orange trees. As an eau de toilette or hair mist, these three diptyque perfumes are the embodiment of summer. In the air and on your skin.

div.data-layer-collected: {"item_name":"Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette 100ml","item_id":"SENS100V2","price":"118.00","item_brand":"Diptyque Paris","item_category":"Fragrances","item_category2":"Eaux de toilette","item_category3":"Floral","item_variant":"Best-seller","item_list_name":"Discover","index":1}

img.alt: Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette 100ml

a.h3: Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette 100ml

div.class: widget block widget-image-text-custom-border-block images-src-mode bottom_left image_full_width banner-home-minthe

div.div: Here it comes alive with vibrant colours and scents. To welcome the summer, the diptyque scented candles spread their Mediterranean fragrances. Cyprs, Choisya and Figuier light up during the day or once the sun has set.

Here it comes alive with vibrant colours and scents. To welcome the summer, the diptyque scented candles spread their Mediterranean fragrances. Cyprs, Choisya and Figuier light up during the day or once the sun has set.

img.alt: Feuille de Lavande / Lavender Leaf candle 190g

a.h3: Feuille de Lavande / Lavender Leaf candle 190g

div.class: widget block widget-image-text-custom-border-block images-src-mode bottom_left image_full_width banner-home-minthe

div.div: The Mediterraneans Savoir-Faire invites itself over. diptyque explores Italian back roads to encounter talented artisans and discover their enchanting expertise. Like the city of Grottaglie, where the Fasano family fires up, enamels and hand-paints the nuances and colors of summer on sublime vases. In Venice, the brand met up with Stories of Italy, an artisans studio revisiting the ancestral technique known as macchia su macchia with vases and photophores in Murano glass.

The Mediterraneans Savoir-Faire invites itself over. diptyque explores Italian back roads to encounter talented artisans and discover their enchanting expertise. Like the city of Grottaglie, where the Fasano family fires up, enamels and hand-paints the nuances and colors of summer on sublime vases. In Venice, the brand met up with Stories of Italy, an artisans studio revisiting the ancestral technique known as macchia su macchia with vases and photophores in Murano glass.

div.class: widget block widget-image-text-custom-border-block images-src-mode bottom_left image_full_width banner-home-minthe

div.div: are at the heart of the La Droguerie collection. Each product is a carefully designed balance of sustainability, beauty and sensory pleasure.
are at the heart of the La Droguerie collection. Each product is a carefully designed balance of sustainability, beauty and sensory pleasure.

div.data-layer-collected: {"item_name":"Leather and wood care lotion with beeswax 250ml","item_id":"DRGLEATHWOOD","price":"25.00","item_brand":"Diptyque Paris","item_category":"La Droguerie","item_category2":"n\/a","item_category3":"n\/a","item_variant":"New","item_list_name":"Discover","index":4}

img.alt: Leather and wood care lotion with beeswax 250ml

a.h3: Leather and wood care lotion with beeswax 250ml

div.class: widget block widget-with-description-block left middle has-sub-border

div.h3: Discover the world of La Droguerie

div.div:
Explore the new La Droguerie collection and discover beautiful household products combining sustainability, effectiveness, delicate fragrances and a sense of luxury.
Get a free sponge when you order a product from the La Droguerie collection with the code: DROGUERIE
Offer valid until 15 July 2022, exclusively on diptyqueparis.com while stocks last. Offers cannot be combined.

img.title: Receive a sample of your fragrance with your order
img.alt: Receive a sample of your fragrance with your order

li.strong: Receive a sample of your fragrance with your order

strong.p: Be the first to know about new products, exclusive discounts, events and more.

div.p: By submitting the form, I agree to the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy.
By clicking OK, I agree to the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy

li.div: Become a fan of Diptyque on Facebook

div.p: Please click on the assistance button, on the bottom-left of your screen.

a.title: Modern slavery and human trafficking statemente

li.a: Modern slavery and human trafficking statemente

div.p: We are sorry but the diptyque site is not fully compatible with the browser you are using.
You can change or update your browser by clicking on the following links.
You can continue your navigation by closing this window but you may encounter problems while browsing.

div.script: // Enable CMS for klevu template var klevu_cmsSearchEnabled = false;

div.p: Monday to Friday - 9.00 am to 6.00 pm - Saturday - 9.00 am to 4.00 pm (Excluding holidays)
We will respond in 1-2 working days. Thank you for your patience.

li.a: How can I track my order ?
What is the burn time of each candle?
